channel.title: Coords HElP!
channel.description: Ok so i got the PlayerShops from a diffrent server and i put them on my server and they worked fine but there is one little problem. On the server i got the files from has a diffrent home and the player shops only work at home. Which is good because i only want them to work at home but my server has a diffrent home which means diffrent coords but i cant figure out which coords to put in here because this is diffrent here's a pic of what i mean and i need the coords around edgeville... [IMG]http://i743.photobucket.com/albums/xx79/b00dpk/untitled-5.jpg[/img]

item.title: Coords HElP!
item.dc:creator: @SacredHeart SacredHeart
item.description:
@SacredHeart wrote:

c.absX > xxxx1 && c.absX xxxx2 && c.absY > yyyy1 && c.absY < yyyy2

So xxxx1 goes with yyyy1 & xxxx2 goes with yyyy2

Read full topic
